title: Ticket #3014: Batch GAHP segfaults gridmanager in trunk
description:
Commit 0530a3d4 introduced the following lines in infnbatchjob.cpp: 

       myResource = INFNBatchResource::FindOrCreateResource( batchType,
                              gahp_args.GetArg(0) );

gahp_args.GetArg(0) is a garbage pointer unless the Remote GAHP is being used, causing the condor_gridmanager to segfault.
remarks:
2012-May-29 15:45:38 by jfrey:
This bug was introduced in Condor 7.7.6, in commit [30087].
